stimulusHtml: For time t ≥ 0 , MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D44@ the position of a particle traveling along a line is given by a differentiable function s. If s is increasing for 0 ≤ t < 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3E43@ and s is decreasing for t > 2 , MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG0bGaeyOpa4JaaGOmaiaacYcaaaa@3C68@ which of the following is the total distance the particle travels for 0 ≤ t ≤ 5 ?
